Gauz bụ aha edemede nke Patrick Armand-Gbaka Brede
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1971 na Abidjan, Ivory Coast
Gauz bụ onye na-ese foto, odee, onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ akụ na ụba nke mba Ivory Coast, na onye dere akwụkwọ akụkọ Debout-Payé, nke "Le Nouvel Attila" bipụtara na 2014, Paris
Akwụkwọ ahụ bụ onye mbụ natara onyinye ọhụrụ: "le prix des libraires" Gibert Joseph.
